column2: Unique record identifier (e.g. AA-1925-01 or UUID)
Scientific name of taxon: Linaria cretacea Fisch. ex Spreng.
Province/region: Aktobe Region, Orenburg Oblast, Donetsk Oblast, Voronezh Oblast
Specific location: Ishkargantau Chalk Ridge, west of Akrab village; Streltsivka chalk outcrop near Streltsivka
Record type: PreservedSpecimen (herbarium) or HumanObservation (field mark)
Herbarium code: AA (Institute of Botany of the Republic of Karelia), LE (Komarovsky), MW (Moscow State University), KW (Institute of Botany of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine)
Brief description: south-facing chalk slope with sparse scree; open marl outcrop with minimal vegetation
